name: The Thief (Armanlone)
description:
Read the Description before playing.

Left Arrow, Right Arrow, and Space for movement. (Or A, D, and Space).

Hover your cursor to unmask the lies hidden inside the rooms.

Story revolves around the THIEF inside the dungeon looting for coins.

  • Enable Full Screen view for better camera view. Click the blue icon instead of the white one.
  • To use your flashlight, just hover your cursor around the room.
  • Just a short puzzle platformer for the Community Game Jam.
  • Filled with 6 levels in different kinds of rooms.
  • For the ending part, just hover your cursor around the room to see what is actually hidden.
  • THEME: The Game is a Liar.
  • Idea: The Room is symbolizes the "Liar", and the Flashlight as the "Light" to see what is/are actually hidden in the Rooms filled with lies.

Tutorials used:

  • Sebastian's Lague 2D Platformer
  • Blackthornprod's Sprite Mask
  • Brackey's  Audio Manager, Scene Manager and the old tutorial on how to rotate the Arm when shooting in 2D Platformer.

Sounds used:

  • SFXR

Sprites used:

  • All of the sprites were created by me except for the Coin Animation.

Salamat pala kay Pats, na Coin Animation lang ang natapos. Sa lahat ng binigay niyang Photoshop files ito lang ang natapos namin. Kung may Pilipino mang nakaintindi nito sa inyo nalang. Ilalagay ko nalang sa baba para makita naman nila.
